title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Amanda Serrano - Katie Taylor fight week
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Amanda Serrano - Katie Taylor fight week
description:
Before a huge boxing weekend Chris sits down with Jake Paul, Shakur Stevenson, Corey Erdman, and Seniesa Estrada. Jake Paul stops by to talk about how this is a huge weekend for him, but as a promoter and not a boxer. He also talks about who he is trying to get in the ring with next. Chris and Corey break down the Serrano-Taylor fight, what we can expect from it, and what we might see from Shakur Stevenson in his fight with Oscar Valdez. Later, Seniesa talks with Chris about her career, being a top 5 boxer in women's boxing, and what she expects from Amanda Serrano and Katie Taylor. Finally, Shakur Stevenson drops in to talk about how much he enjoys seeing Chris's scorecards. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
